Translations.Text: Nihsansaya, amhi ya granthala eka subharatrita1 avatarita kele ahe. Nihsansaya, amhi avagata karuna denare ahota
Tyaca ratrita pratyeka mahattvapurna karyaca nirnaya ghetala jato
Amacyakaduna eka pharmana banuna amhica ahota rasula (sandesavahaka) banavuna pathavinare
Tumacya palanakartyacya krpene, toca ahe aikanara ani jananara
Jo akasanca ani dharatica ani tyancya daramyana je kahi ahe tya sarvanca svami ahe, jara tumhi visvasa rakhanare asala
Tyacyasivaya dusara konihi upasana karanyasa patra nahi. Toca jivanta karato ani marato. Toca tumaca ani tumacyapurvi ho'una gelelya purvajanca svami va palanakarta ahe
Kimbahuna te sansayata paduna khelata aheta
Tumhi tya divasacya pratikseta raha, jevha akasa ughada svarupaca dhura anila
Jo lokanna ghera takila. Hi mothi duhkhadayaka siksa - yatana ahe
(Mhanatila ki) he amacya palanakartya! Ha azaba (siksa - yatana) amacyapasuna dura kara, amhi imana svikarale
Tyancyasathi ata upadesa kothe ahe? Spastaritya nivedana karanare paigambara tyancyajavala (kevhaca) ye'una geleta
Tarihi tyanni tyancyakaduna tonda phiravile ani sangitale ki ha tara sikavilela veda ahe
Amhi siksa - yatanela thodese durahi karu tari tumhi parata punha apalya tyaca avastheta yala
Jya divasi amhi mothya sakta pakadita dharu, niscitaca amhi pratisodha (suda) ghenara ahota
Ani nihsansaya, amhi yapurvi phira'aunacya janasamuhaci (hi) pariksa ghetali ahe jyancyajavala (allahaca) pratisthasampanna rasula (paigambara) ala
Ki allahacya dasanna majhya havali kara, visvasa rakha ki mi tumacyasathi visvasta paigambara ahe
